原文+对照中文翻译：The perceptive among you might have noticed the intimidating camera flash on Minecraft.net, followed by punchy message from a group known as Reset The Net. Here’s an explanation of what‘s going on…
你可能会发现今天minecraft.net出现了一个令人生畏的相机闪光灯，然后下面是一段深奥的文字。让我们来给你们解释一下我们为什么要干这个......
I am extremely confused!
哎呦我去，这吓到我了，你们到底要干什么？
A year ago today it was revealed that the NSA (National Security Agency) and GCHQ (Government Communications Headquarters) were intercepting data from phone and internet networks, and poking around in information stored by US technology companies. That’s extremely uncool.
一年前的这个时候，斯诺登爆料了美国的“棱镜”项目。据透露，NSA（国家安全局）和GCHQ（国家信息总局）会监听人们的电话，从网络公司那里盗走人们在互联网上留下的个人资料等等个人隐私。这非常让人不爽。
Should I click the massive “Click Here” button?
所以说我要点击“Click Here”按钮咯？
Yes! We’ve put that on Minecraft.net today for a reason. Click it now, or read on for more information, then click it!
没错！点击它可以获得更多的信息。
Why should I care?
为什么要关心这件事情？
The internet is a great thing, but the idea of companies operating closely with the government and giving away private data without consent is extremely worrying.
互联网是个十分伟大的东西，但是国家要插手管理互联网并获取私人数据是十分令人不满意的。
It’s a bit like someone accessing your Minecraft server, poking about in your chests, and reading all your chat logs without you knowing, only potentially more damaging (hard to believe – I know).
举个例子吧，就像是有人访问你经常玩的Minecraft服务器，然后未经过你许可打开你的箱子，或者查看你的聊天记录，而且你根本不知道他做了这些。还有可能是更具破坏性的。（我知道这很难让人相信。）
Umm. I’m scared now.
哦，这样啊。我现在感觉到有点害怕了。
There’s no need to be scared. But there is a way to protect yourself. That’s what the Reset The Net campaign is about. It’s a place where you can learn how to fight against a potentially sinister side of the internet. Learn more at Reset The Net or watch the video below for more information.
其实不必害怕。你还是有一个方法来保护自己的，那就是把你的网络活动复位。你要学习如何打击互联网潜在的邪恶的那一面。了解更多，你可以按“Click Here”按钮，或者到Mojang官方博客到原文翻墙看视频。

总而言之，这篇文应该是在讲Mojang对于“棱镜”项目的理解。这里Mojang很贴心的举了一个在Minecraft里的例子，并且给大家提出意见，可以看出Mojang还是一个很有爱的公司嘛{:10_512:}
